channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Bed frame abandoned on road for 4+ weeks, 14th November
item.description:
This wooden bed frame has been on the street for over 4 weeks with not paperwork or indication of it being collected, I reported it a couple of weeks ago but nothing seems to have happened. This is outside number 49 Ruthin Road - SE37SH.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Ruthin Road, Blackheath
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Main drain in the road outside 22 Windmill Hill, 14th November
item.description:
The main drain in the road is apparently blocked and needs urgent attention to prevent flooding down all premises on the hill down to Frognall. Road from the Heath brings down soil etc which blocks drains but a quick job to clear
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 21, Windmill Hill, West Hampstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Leafs need to be cleared, from The Green. B'heath, 14th November
item.description:
Leafs need to be cleared, from The Green. B'heath. Res wants to know why only one side of the green gets cleared off leaves and not the other side. Res says that the even side always gets cleared, but not on the odd side where he lives and he wants to know why this is?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, The Green, Upper Belvedere, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fallen leaves completely covering pavement and side of road, 14th November
item.description:
There are masses of fallen leaves across the pavement and side of the road all around the Southwark park road & Layard Road area. The leaves have created a very thick layer on the pavement causing a slip hazard. It’s also not clear where the pavement ends and road begins, so this is both a trip hazard and a safety issue. It’s been like this for over a week now
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 351, Southwark Park Road, Bermondsey, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pot holes outside number 16 and 5. thames water sewer cover collapsing, 14th November
item.description:
Pot holes outside number 16 and 5. Thames water sewer cover collapsing. Road has become a lot busier and each time the cover is hit , more of the surrounding tarmac breaks off and there is loud bang from the cover

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): St George's Road, North Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet
